SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.localModel

Class ModelView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.localModel.ModelView
public class ModelView extends Object
The `ModelView` class represents the model view for the game. It stores the game data required for the CLI and GUI to display the game state.
